[mybusiness-mcp-extension](../../../modules.md) / [shared/env](../README.md) / getCacheDirectoryName

# Function: getCacheDirectoryName()

> **getCacheDirectoryName**(): `string`

Defined in: [src/shared/env.ts:39](https://github.com/ErikPlachta/vscode-extension-mcp-server/blob/7c19ee49a3a6a5a04e34517f40b64b6722b18db8/src/shared/env.ts#L39)

Compute the cache directory name based on the extension name.
This is used for both workspace-local and global cache folder naming.

## Returns

`string`

Directory name to use for cache storage.
